org.xmlcml.euclid
Class Point2

java.lang.Object
  org.xmlcml.euclid.Point2

public class Point2
extends java.lang.Object

2-dimensional point class Point2 represents a 2-dimensional point. It is one of a set of primitives which can be combined to create and manipulate complex 2-dimensional objects. Points can be transformed with rotation matrices or rotation-translation matrices (Transform2), can be calculated from other primitives or can be used to generate other primitives. Default point is 0.0, 0.0, 0.0

Author:
Peter Murray-Rust, (C) P. Murray-Rust, 1996
